1.details: 1. Clone the new starter repository (https://github.com/thomasperdana/starter.git). 2. Analyze the starter template structure and framework. 3. Install dependencies. 4. Start development server and verify base project runs correctly.

2.content: Phase 2: UI/UX, Theming, and Animation System
2.details: 1. Implement robust theme engine with CSS variables/Tailwind theming. 2. Create Shader Dark Blue Theme (deep navy background, electric blue accents, off-white text). 3. Create Shader Light Green Theme (light mint background, vibrant green accents, dark text). 4. Build theme switcher with local storage persistence. 5. Add smooth theme transitions (300-500ms cross-fade). 6. Implement interactive animations (hover effects, card scaling, page load animations, modal transitions).

3.details: 1. Design central dashboard layout with intuitive navigation. 2. Create navigation for core tools (Résumé Builder, AI Summary Generator, AI Cover Letter Writer, ATS Optimization Tool, Interview Prep Assistant). 3. Build dashboard widgets showing recent résumés, upcoming sessions, quick-start buttons.

4.details: 1. Create multi-column layout with real-time preview. 2. Build form fields for Contact Info, Experience, Education, Skills. 3. Integrate AI Writing Assistant with 'AI Assist' buttons for each section. 4. Implement LLM integration for content enhancement. 5. Add professional résumé template selection.

5.details: 1. Create text area for résumé content input. 2. Build 'Generate Summary' functionality with LLM integration. 3. Display multiple summary options (concise, detailed, industry-specific). 4. Add copy/insert capabilities.

6.details: 1. Create input fields for résumé content, job description, company name, hiring manager. 2. Implement 'Create Cover Letter' with LLM integration. 3. Generate personalized cover letters aligning experience with job requirements.

7.details: 1. Build side-by-side text areas for résumé and job description. 2. Create 'Scan & Optimize' functionality with AI analysis. 3. Implement keyword identification and match scoring. 4. Provide ATS formatting and phrasing suggestions.

8.details: 1. Create job description input interface. 2. Build 'Generate Questions' feature for behavioral, technical, situational questions. 3. Implement interactive practice mode. 4. Add AI feedback system for answer quality and structure.

9.details:
✅ Website successfully deployed to https://8yyd4u7o2gt4.space.minimax.io
✅ Complete codebase pushed to GitHub repository: https://github.com/thomasperdana/resume-builder.git
✅ All AI-powered features implemented with OpenRouter integration
✅ Dual theme system with smooth transitions functional
✅ All 5 core tools completed and integrated
